gen:link.msg:message: `FinanceLeasesMinimalLeasePayments` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesFinanceLeaseLiabilitiesMaturityBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_FinanceLeasesMinimalLeasePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesFinanceLeaseLiabilitiesMaturityBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_FinanceLeasesMinimalLeasePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesFinanceLeaseLiabilitiesMaturityBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinanceLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesFinanceLeaseLiabilitiesMaturityBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinanceLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesFinanceLeaseLiabilitiesMaturityBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinanceLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedNoncurrentLiabilitiesFinanceLeaseLiabilitiesMaturityBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinanceLeasesMinimalLeasePaymentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
